00062         Debug::Log("Dumping %u bytes of object at %X\n", len, data);
00063 
00064         Debug::Log(" 00000 |");
00065         for(DWORD rem = 0; rem < 0x10; ++rem) {
00066                 Debug::Log(" %02X |", rem);
00067         }
00068         Debug::Log("\n\n");
00069         for(DWORD dec = 0; dec < len / 0x10; ++dec) {
00070                 Debug::Log(" %04X0 |", dec);
00071                 for(DWORD rem = 0; rem < 0x10; ++rem) {
00072                         Debug::Log(" %02X |", data[dec * 0x10 + rem]);
00073                 }
00074                 for(DWORD rem = 0; rem < 0x10; ++rem) {
00075                         byte sym = data[dec * 0x10 + rem];
00076                         Debug::Log("%c", isprint(sym) ? sym : '?');
00077                 }
00078                 Debug::Log("\n");
00079         }
00080 
00081         DWORD dec = len / 0x10 * 0x10;
00082         DWORD remlen = len - dec;
00083         Debug::Log(" %05X |", dec);
00084         for(DWORD rem = 0; rem < remlen; ++rem) {
00085                 Debug::Log(" %02X |", data[dec + rem]);
00086         }
00087         for(DWORD rem = remlen; rem < 0x10; ++rem) {
00088                 Debug::Log(" -- |");
00089         }
00090         for(DWORD rem = 0; rem < remlen; ++rem) {
00091                 byte sym = data[dec + rem];
00092                 Debug::Log("%c", isprint(sym) ? sym : '?');
00093         }
00094         Debug::Log("\nEnd of dump.\n");
00095 }

size_t  len 
) [static] 

00097                                               {
00098         Debug::Log("Dumping %X bytes of stack\n", len);
00099         for(size_t i = 0; i < len; i += 4) {
00100                 Debug::Log("esp+%04X = %08X\n", i, R->get_StackVar32(i));
00101         }
00102         Debug::Log("Done.\n");
